segments.text: I find myself quite repulsed by the sheer mess developing here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The idea of standing in an expanding puddle of sink water is just vile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at it, it's flowing freely, tainting the clean kitchen cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just doesn't seem to care, or even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a complete disregard for cleanliness and order.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That dirty water will ruin the floor and the cabinet wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the pristine garden outside makes it even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the dampness and stickiness of that floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why would anyone allow such a disaster to happen right under their nose?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly makes me feel a bit sick to my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to act quickly before it's completely out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This lack of attention to basic household maintenance is just shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR
